FAQ.question: What is Form 11-B used for?
FAQ.answer: It certifies rural property ownership and building details recorded under the Gram Panchayat.

FAQ.question: Is Form 11-B required for house construction?
FAQ.answer: Yes. It is needed for building permissions and Panchayat approvals.

FAQ.question: Does Form 11-B apply to agricultural land?
FAQ.answer: It applies mainly to buildings and village properties under Panchayat jurisdiction.
